name: Bernard the Battle Bard
description:
Idea

You are Bernard the Battle Bard. The monsters have stolen your song book. You must enter their dungeon and retrieve your songs. You don’t have long, you’re expected to perform at the Royal Ball… TONIGHT!!

There’s only one way in and out of the dungeon. You enter the dungeon equipped with your sword and horn. By finding your missing song sheets, you’ll be able to play songs that will no-doubt help you get out of the dungeon in one-piece.

IMPORTANT: I ran out of time and the game lacks any UX considerations sorry! But I'm still proud of the idea and what I managed to make!

Controls
  • Left click Tap / Hold - Use Main hand actions
  • Right click Tap / Hold - Use Off hand actions
  • Q - cycle main hand items
  • E - cycle off hand items
  • P - Restart the game

Weapon: tap to slash, hold to sweep attack

Horn: tap to change song, hold to play song. Gain buffs for playing full songs.
